<Meta title="Components/Atoms/Icons/Intro" />

# Icons

## References
- [apple HIG](https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/foundations/icons/)

An effective icon is a graphic asset that expresses a single concept in ways people instantly understand.

## Icons at HENK
At HENK we use SVG icons, designed in Figma and copied / exported as SVG files / code. In Twig we use them as code in order to have more control over its styling and animation possibilities.

### Note !
Please make sure in Figma that icons have widths and heights of full pixels, so no width of 17.13 etc. That might cause alignment issues.

## The Icons

    <dt>title</dt>
    <dd>def</dd>
</dl>
